attributes.action: Make Kenalog injections available on the NHS.
attributes.additional_details: All you have to do is search google or YouTube to see doctors praising the drug.
attributes.background: Allergy and hayfever medication that actually works! Why should the NHS not pay for it!

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the UK Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

Kenalog and similar injections are already availability on the NHS, including, in certain situations and with caution, for treatment of allergies. You can find out more here:

https://bnf.nice.org.uk/drug/triamcinolone-acetonide.html

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. 

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
